Title: Relates to including rifles and shotguns in warnings to consumers regarding the risk of death or suicide
Summary: Includes rifles and shotguns in required warnings to consumers regarding the risk of death or suicide in homes where such weapons are present.
LawCode: Amd ยง400.00, Pen L; amd ยง2, Chap of 2024 (as proposed in S.6649 & A.2882)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to requiring warnings regarding rifles and shotguns; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2024 amending the penal law relating to warnings to be posted and provided by firearms dealers, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S.6649 and A. 2882, in relation to making certain technical corrections thereto
